name: FreeZeon
description:
A shmup made for the Summer Remake Jam.  This game was inspired by BlaZeon.

Instructions:

* Survive as long as you can

* Take over enemy ships with a Steal Shot

* Gain extra energy to steal enemy ships by defeating enemies.

Controls:

Keyboard:
* Movement: WASD, Arrow Keys
* Shoot: Space, P
* Steal Shot: Z, G
* Pause Game: Enter
* Reset to Main Menu: F5
* Full Screen: F1

Controller:
* Movement: D-Pad, Left Axis
* Shoot: PS Cross, Xbox A, Nintendo B
* Steal Shot: PS Square, Xbox X, Nintendo Y
* Pause Game: PS Start, Xbox Start, Nintendo +

Created by Chukobyte and PineappleOnPizza
